verses.name: 2 Chronicles 20:27
verses.text: Then they returned, every man of Judah and Jerusalem, and Jehoshaphat in the forefront of them, to go again to Jerusalem with joy; for the Lord had made them to rejoice over their enemies.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 20:28
verses.text: And they came to Jerusalem with psalteries and harps and trumpets unto the house of the Lord.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 20:29
verses.text: And the fear of God was on all the kingdoms of those countries, when they had heard that the Lord fought against the enemies of Israel.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 20:30
verses.text: So the realm of Jehoshaphat was quiet: for his God gave him rest round about.
